author: tommaso
msg: OAK-1551 - EmbeddedSolrServerProvider stops the SolrRunner at SolrServer#shutdown, minor deployment fixes

author: markt
msg: Improve processing of chuck size from chunked headers. Avoid overflow and use a bit shift instead of a multiplication as it is marginally faster.
This is the fix for CVE-2014-0075

author: markt
msg: Make upload process more robust. If upload fails and it was going to update an existing WAR, don't remove the existing WAR.
